name: Thermostat Sim
description:
A thermostat simulator. Thats all it is. Im not lying.

This game was made in about 2 hours and 30 minuites on the first monday of the summer in 2020. I made this more as a practice to make , polish, and release a game as I have been working on larger projects and wanted to do something quick and fun, as well as make a joke game.

If you enjoy this game, please check out some of my other earlier releases. Most big things I work on dont get released on my itch.io though.
